CargoMission.name: Special Delivery
CargoMission.description: A strange cargo crate was stored on [location1] for several weeks. Now [reward] credits are offered in exchange for delivering crate to a customer in [location2].
CargoMission.successmessage: Security check revealed that container was designed to detonate contained explosives on some time. Personnel in [location2] was very worried after checking the crate's payload, hovewer, they still pay you [reward] credits for enough bravery for transporting such dangerous cargo.

CargoMission.name: Special Delivery
CargoMission.description: A strange cargo crate was stored on [location1] for several weeks. Now [reward] credits are offered in exchange for delivering crate to a customer in [location2].
CargoMission.successmessage: Security check revealed that container was filled with nitroglycerin. Personnel of [location2] took the cargo and paid you for the delivery.

CargoMission.name: Special Delivery
CargoMission.description: A strange cargo crate was stored on [location1] for several weeks. Now [reward] credits are offered in exchange for delivering crate to a customer in [location2].
CargoMission.successmessage: Security check revealed that there was an artifact of unknown origin lying in container. Personnel of [location2] sent cargo for additional research and paid you for the delivery.
